Plus.Title: Plus
Plus.Content1: Please download and update: AI Productivity Assistant (APA), to experience the full functionality.
Plus.Content2: Free and open source, improve user productivity, and protect privacy and data security. Provide efficient and convenient AI solutions, including but not limited to: built-in local exclusive ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Phi, Qwen, one-click batch intelligent processing of images, videos, audio, etc.

Chat.InputPrompt: Please enter the prompt, send shortcut key: Ctrl + Enter
Chat.Help:
Generate Chat [ Qwen3-1.7B ]: ChatGPT, DeepSeek, Phi, Qwen, chat, knowledge, learning...
Operation steps: input prompt → click send → wait for the result

SuperResolution.Help:
Image Super Resolution: One-click batch image super resolution...Supported file formats: (JPG/JPEG/PNG)
Operation steps: Select input directory → Select output directory → Select processing platform → Select processing mode → Select processing scaling → Click the start button → Wait for processing to complete
Input directory: Select the input directory location
Output directory: Select the output directory location
Processing platform: Select the processing platform (CPU/GPU)
Processing mode: Select the processing mode (standard) 
Processing scaling: Select processing scaling (X2/X4/X8)

Input directory: Select input directory location
Output directory: Select output directory location

Processing mode: Select processing mode (standard) 
Processing mask: Use a brush to automatically generate a mask or select a custom mask file
